Title: Object: Hebrew Woman & Child
Series: Sir David Wilkie's Sketches in Turkey, Syria & Egypt, 1840 & 1841
Description: A young woman wearing a turban with a veil pinned under the chin, a gown with embroidered sleeves and a striped cloak, sitting on the ground directed to left, holding a child wearing a turban with a jewel over the forehead in her lap, she looking down at her child while he smiles towards the viewer. Hand-coloured lithograph printed in grey and beige
Curator's comments: From a set of lithographs 'Drawn on Stone by Joseph Nash', published in two volumes, London, 1843 and 1846 (1918,0205.2-8). See ODNB for Nash
Bibliographic references: Abbey Travel / Travel in Aquatint and lithography 1770-1860 from the library of J.R.Abbey (379.18)
